author: Mike
content:
Hermione is such a beautiful ship. Virtually new by most standards. How did she come to be rot filled so very soon after launching? Was the very long build time to blame – the empty hull allowed to get rain and stagnant water lying in it? Poor materials ? Unlikely in France where fine wood is so valued and grows in such profusion. What was the life span of a working ship in the period of the original Hermione? I suspect the builder would have been in serious trouble from the French Navy of the
time had their handiwork mouldered away so quickly.
